main event: A bright object resembling a gigantic ball of fire was observed in the sky over El Campo, Texas, on September 17, 1960.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 20 minutes and appeared to be very bright, comparable to a searchlight., The observation included both ground-radar and air-visual types., The object diminished to a pinpoint before disappearing., The report does not categorize the object as unidentified but notes it was not a known phenomenon., The witness was a 46-year-old airline pilot flying at an altitude of 6,090 feet.
